channel.title: Character File migrater
channel.description:
Since I began programing classes in my local college about 3 years ago. Near the begining of my first semester I created a program that could migrate a character file from one server folder to another, and even from VPS to my desktop computer since I hosted one server on my desktop and 2 on my VPS. Today I am repopening this program and fixing it. The Problems are:
-Migration take about 5 minutes, depending on character file size -The program is hard to set-up -and the many bugs included
I was wondering if anyone was interested in the beta version of this program. I need some people to test it since I don't have a place to host. In return I will give you the full version of this host migrater. Hopefully if you don't ruin this...it will be a rare and valueable program.
Things I have managed to fix for the beta: -Migration now takes about 30 seconds -the set up is simple (the two servers dump the character files in the same file) -and many glitches and character file bugs have been fixed.
This program pretty much has never been made. This is a one time chance, I will pick one person to beta test this. Please reply if you are interested!

item.title: Character File migrater
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:344739”]gratz u made a bad version of filezilla[/quote]Seeing how filezilla is an FTP client and this doesn’t even use the FTP protocol, no, it has no relation whatsoever. He did however make a “bad version of FTP”.

Read full topic

gratz u made a bad version of filezilla

item.title: Character File migrater
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“mylust4blood, post:3, topic:344739”]Ok…? now what is FTP?[/quote]An existent protocol that accomplishes what you want (sending file data from a server to any connected client).

And for local network file moving, you can just right click the files and press copy, then right click the destination folder and press paste.

Read full topic
